Package camzup.core

Class Vert2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Vert2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Vert2>
public class Vert2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Vert2>
Organizes the components of a 2D mesh into a group of coordinate and texture coordinate such that they can be edited together. This is not used by a mesh internally; it is created upon retrieval from a mesh. All of its components should be treated as references to data within the mesh, not as independent values.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Vec2 coord
    The coordinate of the vertex in world space.
    Vec2 texCoord
    The texture (UV) coordinate for an image mapped onto the mesh.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Vert2()
    The default constructor.

    Constructs a vertex from a coordinate and texture coordinate.
